text:
Levi flinched, the weight of her words hitting him hard. He averted his gaze, a pang of guilt and shame coursing through him. He knew she was right. He had abandoned her, and she’d endured so much on her own. But in his own twisted logic he thought it was better for her. That she’d be better off without him.
Now, seeing her standing before him, working for his enemy, he couldn’t help but question his decision…
trans:
Levi sursauta, le poids de ses mots le frappant durement. Il détourna le regard, une douleur de culpabilité et de honte parcourant son corps. Il savait qu'elle avait raison. Il l'avait abandonnée, et elle avait enduré tant de choses seule. Mais dans sa logique tordue, il pensait que c'était mieux pour elle. Qu'elle serait mieux sans lui.
Maintenant, la voyant debout devant lui, travaillant pour son ennemi, il ne pouvait s'empêcher de remettre en question sa décision...
